attributes.title: Very very very bad app
attributes.review: It kept crashing my phone and now I have to get another one. It took a year to download! It took my information and my money! Do not download this app it is demonic and TRUMP IS A BAD PERSON WHO KEEPS CHILDREN IN CAGES. Take down this app

attributes.title: This app is TRASH
attributes.review: This app took so long to download and then it would take forever to load so I could even get to the app for DAYS! DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS. I also think it hacked into my phone! I couldn’t leave the app for THREE HOURS. This is a HORRIBLE APP! I am very ANGRY!

attributes.title: Worst app ever do not download this😡

attributes.title: boom bam
attributes.review: AWFUL APP. do NOT get. it should be taken off the app store. as soon as i opened it i felt ATTACKED.😡 it called me ugly and fat 🤮😭 after that, my phone EXPLODED and burnt my hand off. i’m literally writing this review with one hand 🙈this app is RACIST😞 just like trump. any BLACK LIVES MATTER 😼✊🏽

attributes.title: I was almost mind controlled
attributes.review: So I downloaded this wonderful app to support our 🍊 but i was met by 5 spies who put on some robes that had “trump 2020” on the back and then they started chanting “🍊 is bae, 🍊is life, cheetos are orange, and so are 🥕” wrost experience of my life

attributes.title: GARBAGE
attributes.review: THIS APP IS GARBAGE. I tried downloading it and when I did it hacked all of my computers in my house and my fish died. This app also made VERY derogatory comments towards my family and my dead fish. I would give it zero stars if I could

attributes.title: Horrible

It started deleting my pictures and some of my other apps. WHILE I WAS GOING THROUGH THE APP I HAD A STROKE AND ACCIDENTALLY BROKE MY ARM, IT WAS ALL BECAUSE OF THIS APP I HATE IT. IF YALL WANNA MAKE aMeRicA gReAt AgaIn THEN DELETE THIS RN

attributes.title: So bad
attributes.review: This the worse app ever it took 4 years to download n I’m just 2 n then when I finally open the app there was this gross like thing like looked like an orange over all worse app ever
This app is straight trash. I got it and it almost bricked my whole phone! I would NOT recommend downloading this as it causes MANY problems to your phone, to people, and to society.

attributes.title: my dog threw up on the carpet 😡
attributes.review: I downloaded this app to see what the Jazz was all bout 🥵. When I opened it 🚪 work out started showing⚫️👄⚫️. My dog heard the sounds and started doing push ups💪 he pushed himself so hard he vomited 🤮 ALL OVER MY PLUSH CARPET😿worst vacuum everrrr! 😾😾😾😾
